left.name: submitter_donor_id
left.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

right.name: submitter_donor_id
right.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

left.name: clinical_stage_group
left.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

right.name: clinical_stage_group
right.description: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(depends on tumour_staging_system selected value)

left.name: stage_suffix
left.description: If necessary, use this field to add any applicable stage suffixes. Stage suffixes may apply to certain staging systems such as Ann Arbour staging system where the four stages are divided into 4 categories (A, B, X and E).

right.name: stage_suffix
right.description: If necessary, use this field to add any applicable stage suffixes. Stage suffixes may apply to certain staging systems such as Ann Arbour staging system where the four stages are divided into 4 categories (A, B, X and E).

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(depends on tumour_staging_system selected value)

left.name: clinical_t_category
left.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

right.name: clinical_t_category
right.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(only needed if tumour_staging_system=AJCC)

left.name: clinical_n_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

right.name: clinical_n_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

restrictions.script: clinicaWithMagic(only needed if tumour_staging_system=AJCC)

left.name: clinical_m_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

right.name: clinical_m_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at time of primary diagnosis and prior to treatment, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual. MX is NOT a valid category and cannot be assigned.

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(only needed if tumour_staging_system=AJCC)

left.name: pathological_t_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the size or contiguous extension of the primary tumour (T), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

right.name: pathological_t_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the size or contiguous extension of the primary tumour (T), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(only needed if tumour_staging_system=AJCC)

left.name: pathological_n_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether or not the cancer has reached nearby lymph nodes (N), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

right.name: pathological_n_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether or not the cancer has reached nearby lymph nodes (N), according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(only needed if tumour_staging_system=AJCC)

left.name: pathological_m_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether there are distant metastases (M), meaning spread of cancer to other parts of the body, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

right.name: pathological_m_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by whether there are distant metastases (M), meaning spread of cancer to other parts of the body, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(only needed if tumour_staging_system=AJCC)

left.name: pathological_stage_group
left.description: Specify the tumour stage, based on tumor_staging_system, used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected.

right.name: pathological_stage_group
right.description: Specify the tumour stage, based on tumor_staging_system, used to assess the cancer at the time the tumour specimen was resected.

left.name: tumour_grade
left.description: Grade of the tumour as assigned by the reporting tumour_grading_system.

right.name: tumour_grade
right.description: Grade of the tumour as assigned by the reporting tumour_grading_system.

restrictions.script: validateWithMagic(depends on tumour_grading_system)
